linkedinPersonalTeaser:
When a consumer types "what's the best wet vac for cleaning sandy spots," who wins that search?

Not whoever has the best SEO. Not whoever spent the most on ads.

The winner is whoever actually solves that specific, weird, deeply human problem.

Omnicom's new Google partnership captures the actual questions people ask, not the sanitized keywords. Meanwhile, Shopify reports AI driven purchases grew 11x this year.

Consumers don't think in keywords. They think in problems. And AI is getting better at capturing those problems before anyone in marketing sees them.

Local partners have an advantage here. They solve specific problems for specific communities. That's exactly the kind of signal AI is learning to prioritize.

The question isn't whether to invest in local activation. It's whether you can figure out which partners actually solve the problems your consumers are asking about.
